name: Cloud Gazer
text: Your insight into your elemental heritage gives you a clarity of sight few humans possess.
benefit: You can see through fog, mist, and clouds, without penalty, ignoring any cover or concealment bonuses from such effects. If the effect is created by magic, this feat instead triples the distance you can see without penalty.
text_zh: 通过洞悉自身体内的元素本质，你获得了只有少数人拥有的清晰洞察力。
benefit_zh: 你可以看透雾、水汽以及云而不会因此受到任何惩罚，并且忽略这些效果造成的掩蔽或隐蔽加值。如果这些效果是由魔法创造的，该专长使你不受罚值而能够看到的距离提升至三倍。
